Package net.floodlightcontroller.debugevent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomFormatter<T>
    Format Event object based on its class and store accordingly in EventResource
    IDebugEventService  
    IEventCategory<T>
    EventCategory is used to log events for pre-registered events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DebugEventAppender<E>  
    DebugEventAppender.WarnErrorEvent  
    DebugEventResource
    All the Immutable Resource classes for REST API.
    DebugEventResource.EventInfoResource
    Resource class for DebugEventService.EventInfo.
    DebugEventService
    This class implements a central store for all events used for debugging the system.
    DebugEventService.DebugEventHistory
    Event history for a particular event-id is stored in a circular buffer
    DebugEventService.EventInfo
    Event Information
    DebugEventService.LocalEventHistory
    Thread local storage for events
    DebugEventTest  
    Event
    Generic Event class used to store different categories of events.
    EventResource
    Event Instance of a particular event category.
    EventResource.EventResourceBuilder  
    EventResource.Metadata
    Actual Event has Object of Event.
    EventTest  
    MockDebugEventService  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description

    Is the Event ACKABLE or NOT_ACKABLE

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    IDebugEventService.EventColumn
    EventColumn is the only annotation given to the fields of the event when updating an event.
